price: 29. Todėl primink (žmonijai apie islamo monoteizmą, o Muchammedai ﷺ). Prisiekiu tavo Viešpaties Malone, tu nesi šarlatanas ir nesi beprotis.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
